channel.title: WarTusk-Development Team
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape community,
Today I got online with tons of messages from friendly community members wanting to help out with WarTusk!
I am so happy to hear the positive feedback I am getting from everyone! So it's time to make this development post for those who want to help with the project!
Want to see what the project is? Click this link below! https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670006.msg4480198/topicseen.html#new
I am always taking an extra set of hands to help with this project no matter what type of experience you have!
Looking For:
[b]Web Developer[/b]: Looking for a great web developer who can make something very nice that will Right Off make a great first impression for players who stumble across WarTusk! First impressions really do matter! I want the player to be hooked right when he gets on the website and have just a huge desire to download and start playing!
[b]Artists[/b] I am looking for those who are great at making great images! [EX: Banners,Splash Screens, Pictures, Signatures, Icons, E.T.C] If you have the talent at designing these types of things then please share some of your previous work. I am needing people for this position so advertisers can make there advertisements more attractive!
[b]Advertisers[/b] I am looking for advertisers to go around bumping posts/creating posts for WarTusk! This also applies to Video editors! WarTusk really needs some advertising videos for players to watch and see! Now this will be a pretty big task. What type of videos I am looking for?
-First Look Videos
-Unique Content
-How To Play
-Classes (How each class works. EX: Mage,Ranger,Warrior) "Spells,Abilities,Skills"
-Future Update Videos
-Weekly Videos
-Commentary Videos
I am just wanting tons of videos to go out for new players to watch so they can learn how to play but what to expect from WarTusk so they do not get so overwhelmed when they first login.
[b]Beta Testers[/b] Need some members to help during the Beta! Focusing on what should be Changed/Added to WarTusk to make the game experience more fun!
[b]Source & Client Developers[/b]
Not looking for any at the moment until after Beta. But please feel free to leave your information for the future!
[u][b]Applcation[/b][/u]
[b]Name:[/b]
[b]Age:[/b]
[b]Location: [EX: U.S.A][/b]
[b]Time Zone:[/b]
[b]Position Applying For:[/b]
[b]Work Experience:[/b] [EX: Websites, videos, and projects you have done before/] "feel free to post links on this to your projects you have done" Also please add the amount of time you have been doing your specialty skill for. [EX: Developing for 6 years]
[b]Why you should be part of the WarTusk Team?:[/b]
[b]How much time can you put into this project?:[/b]
[b]What are some positives and negatives we should know that will effect your position on the team:[/b] [EX: I go to college so I cant spend to much time on this -OR- I am currently out of school right now so I have tons of time]
Thank you in advance for taking the time to read this and filling out the application! I know it is a lot but I am not wanting this server to be like every other server. I want this to be on top of the server lists. I want this to succeed!
You can send your applications to my inbox.
I will reply to you through private message for those who are accepted or are put on a waiting list. Note: this is not only posted on Moparscape so there is others from other forums who are as well applying for these positions so make sure your application is clean/simple and well put together!
Also please throw out a friendly bump on WarTusk for more players and community members to see! https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670006.msg4480198/topicseen.html#new
Thanks everyone and hope to hear from y'all soon! :D
[Rewards vary on your position and amount of work you put into your position]

item.title: WarTusk-Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Magy Magy
item.description:
@Magy wrote:

Name: Bendik

Age: 17, 18 in 2 months.

Location: Norway

Time Zone: GMT +1

Position Applying For: Betatester.

Work Experience: I’ve played Runescape since I 2006-2007ish and have been enjoying it since. I’ve played on and off and have regularly been playing RSPS. I’ve tons of experience from playing Runescape and I think I could contribute with ideas and feedback to help develop the server.

Why you should be part of the WarTusk Team?: As I stated in my last sentence. I’ve feel like I can contribute to this server in a positive way. ’

How much time can you put into this project?: Atleast 1 hour every day, but in the weekend I can play up to 6 hrs in total or even more.

What are some positives and negatives we should know that will effect your position on the team: Negatives would be my timezone. If for example I’m sleeping when you are awake and online and the other way around it could be hard to communicate in a good way, but I still believe I can betatest in a proper way and give a decent feedback on what I like and what I don’t like. An other negative would be exam coming around next week. That will take 2 days of my time, but after that I am good to go.

Read full topic

item.title: WarTusk-Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

Applcation

Name: Kiwan

Age: 14

Location: [Israel]

Time Zone: GMT +2

Position Applying For: Source Developer, Content authour(Such as quests I actually wrote 4 unique quests this week

Work Experience:
[Developer for Atonement]
[Developer for Complex]
[Head Moderator forDivination of Gods]
[Moderator for Emps-World]

Why you should be part of the WarTusk Team?:I have the passion to create a server that is going to be a unique one, I know what the people want, I played rsps for 6 years, I know about everything in os

How much time can you put into this project?: Like 3-4 hours/day

What are some positives and negatives we should know that will effect your position on the team:I just finished my exams, I only go to school, I go out sometimes like every 2 days.

Read full topic

item.title: WarTusk-Development Team
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

[quote=“furyking50, post:2, topic:551273”]Name: Ryan

Age: 14

Location: USA

Time Zone: Eastern

Position Applying For: Beta Tester

Work Experience: ( I don’t really know what to say here…) A beta tested lot’s of servers and helped out with them

Why you should be part of the WarTusk Team?: To beta test and tell you things you should add and not.

How much time can you put into this project?: A good amount.

What are some positives and negatives we should know that will effect your position on the team: I go to school and i have a thing called Parcc so i cant be on much in the week, but mostly on the weekends i can be on for awhile .[/quote]

Hey Furyking! I would love to have you as a beta tester! I am sending you a message now with more info!

Read full topic

item.title: WarTusk-Development Team

Name:

Age:

Time Zone:

Position Applying For:

Work Experience: [EX: Websites, videos, and projects you have done before/] “feel free to post links on this to your projects you have done” Also please add the amount of time you have been doing your specialty skill for.
[EX: Developing for 6 years]

Why you should be part of the WarTusk Team?:

How much time can you put into this project?:

What are some positives and negatives we should know that will effect your position on the team: [EX: I go to college so I cant spend to much time on this -OR- I am currently out of school right now so I have tons of time]

Thank you in advance for taking the time to read this and filling out the application! I know it is a lot but I am not wanting this server to be like every other server. I want this to be on top of the server lists. I want this to succeed!
